name: Dash Shark in Hungry Fish Tank
name_original: Dash Shark in Hungry Fish Tank
description:
In Dash Shark in Hungry Fish Tank, your aim is to catch all the fishes and avoid the sharks!
Build up your combo all the way to Awesome to turn the fishes into delicious sushi, but be aware: your oxygen tank will soon ran out, so tap any bubble you can find to refill it!

Featuring:
-Frenzy Action
-Lots of different fishes to turn into sushi
-Combos and score multipliers
-Hungry Sharks ready to bite your fingers off!

Download it now for FREE!
